Text: Zyqwux: cool! quite a difference between this first 'edition' and Chessmaster 10th Edition. btw, I didn't expect this antediluvian app to work at all under Win XP, but to my surprise it did.

Hehe. I also think it is cool! Have u beated the Chessmaster yet?

Download Winboard or Xboard with an engine like Ruffian to.
